hero.title: Baggage reconciliation everywhere
hero.subtitle: Baggage management and reconciliation system for air transport
hero.description: Looking for a modern and efficient solution for baggage management and reconciliation in your airline? BRSATS is a customizable mobile and web application, location-independent and offline-capable for iOS and Android that revolutionizes baggage management in our partner airports (Kinshasa, Kisangani, Goma, Lubumbashi, Kolwezi, Kananga, Mbuji-Mayi, Gemena, Mbandaka)!
hero.watchVideo: Click here to watch the video.

items.title: Replaces conventional systems
items.description: BRSATS is a modern, wireless, easy-to-use, operating system-independent and cost-effective alternative to traditional baggage management systems. Baggage reconciliation and tracking are performed without any technical effort.

items.title: Anytime, anywhere
items.description: Intelligent cloud services synchronize data between target systems, documents or databases. This works independently of your location, even in different airports, facilities or countries. With full offline support.

items.title: For all systems
items.description: Supported systems: desktop applications (Windows/macOS), databases accessible via ODBC (e.g. Microsoft Accessâ„¢, SQL Server, SQL Express, Oracle, etc.), Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, airport management systems (AODB) and custom API integrations.

services.title: BRSATS Features
services.subtitle: BRSATS offers a complete and modern solution for baggage reconciliation in air transport. Discover the features that make BRSATS the reference tool for baggage management.

items.title: Barcode scanning
items.description: Fast and accurate scanning of baggage barcodes directly from your smartphone. Compatible with all standard barcode formats (Code 128, EAN, QR Code, etc.).

items.title: Real-time reconciliation
items.description: Reconcile baggage in real-time with instant synchronization. Track the status of each bag (loaded, in transit, unloaded) in real-time.

items.title: Tracking and location
items.description: Track each bag through all stages of its journey. Quickly locate missing or misplaced bags thanks to complete history.

items.title: Cloud synchronization
items.description: All data is automatically synchronized to the cloud. Access your information from anywhere, even offline with deferred synchronization.

items.title: Reports and statistics
items.description: Generate detailed reports and statistics on your reconciliation operations. Export data in Excel, PDF or CSV format for your analysis.

items.title: Multi-user
items.description: Manage multiple users with different access levels. Work as a team with real-time synchronization between all devices.

readyToUse.title: Ready to use in a few steps
readyToUse.description: Install the BRSATS application on your smartphone and start reconciling your baggage in minutes.
readyToUse.videoDescription: The BRSATS application allows you to reconcile baggage in real-time directly from your smartphone. Scanned data is synchronized in real-time, enabling precise and efficient tracking of all baggage.
